vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
MiniMeToken.balances (MiniMeToken.sol#122) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (MiniMeToken.sol#216-245)
	- balanceOfAt (MiniMeToken.sol#323-342)
	- generateTokens (MiniMeToken.sol#415-424)
	- destroyTokens (MiniMeToken.sol#431-440)

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: MiniMeToken.isContract (MiniMeToken.sol#503-513) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (MiniMeToken.sol#259-277):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(ITokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) == true) (MiniMeToken.sol#271)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (MiniMeToken.sol#274)

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
MiniMeToken.claimTokens (MiniMeToken.sol#537-547) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (MiniMeToken.sol#545)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ MiniMeToken.sol#472) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ MiniMeToken.sol#516-518)

vulnerability_findings.name: assembly
vulnerability_findings.message:
MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (MiniMeToken.sol#503-513)
	- MiniMeToken.sol#508-512

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: string public version = "MMT_0.1"; //An arbitrary versioning scheme
vulnerability_findings.message: MiniMeToken.version should be constant (MiniMeToken.sol#93)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Controlled.changeController (MiniMeToken.sol#71-73) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function receiveApproval(

        address from,

        uint256 _amount,

        address _token,

        bytes _data
vulnerability_findings.message: ApproveAndCallFallBack.receiveApproval (MiniMeToken.sol#77-82) should be declared external
